reviewText: Took off a star because I wish it were more clear that it was volume one .  I know,  I am an idiot but to be fair , the "1" is sort of hidden in the wording on the bottom of the item .  I actually already have the series and thought mistakenly that this was the movie version.  Love this story ; the animation did a good job but as the saying goes,  the book version is a lot better.
